in.srain.cube.views.ptr

Class PtrUIHandlerHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.srain.cube.views.ptr.PtrUIHandlerHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class PtrUIHandlerHook
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Run a hook runnable, the runnable will run only once. After the runnable is done, call resume to resume. Once run, call takeover will directory call the resume action
